nodes.text: The Coruscant Aegis was a covert operations squadron founded to protect the Galactic Republic from the Sith Empire during the Galactic War. As the Imperial Armada had started to attack Republic assets in secret every member had to strike independently on different locations across the galaxy to break the Imperial offensive swiftly and decisively. Every member was given their own unique callsign.
Their Imperial counterpart was the Empire's Fury.
